doc.title: 20XX
doc.plot: Scott Vance made a deal with his father: get a degree in business to fall back on, and Scott could do whatever he wanted with his life. As Scott breaks the news to his family that he will be attending art school for his masters program, Scott soon realizes that life isn't always fair. Scott turns to his twenty-something friends Madison and Victor to figure what he's going to do with his life. As Scott's family continues to pressure him to take a job at his father's company, Scott must decide whether to join the ranks of working class stiffs or break away.
